price: Wakasema: Ewe Luut'i! Usipo acha, hapana shaka utakuwa miongoni mwa wanao tolewa mji!.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡرَجِينَ
footnotes: Walikasirika kwa kule kuwakataza na kuwakemea kwa sababu ya jambo ovu na wakasema: Kama hukuacha kutukebehi tutakutoa mji kwa izara kubwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yālūṭu latakūnanna mina al-mukh'rajīna
